text: Alexis Mérodack-Jeanneau (1 December 1873 – 8 March 1919) was a French painter from Angers. He was born in Angers in 1873, and died there in 1919. He is associated with the Fauvist movement. Category:1873 births Category:1919 deaths Category:French painters Category:People from Angers
title: Alexis Mérodack-Jeanneau
